articles.author: Tushar Kelshikar
articles.title: Kia achieves operating profit in just 1 year - Team-BHP
articles.description: Kia has become one of the quickest carmakers to turn operationally profitable in India. Kia has achieved operational profitability in just the first year of operations. By the end of the last fiscal, the company’s operational profit stood at Rs. 308 crore.
